title: Rosicrucian Circle: Fludd, Maier, Dee & Khunrath
description: The core figures of the Rosicrucian enlightenment: Robert Fludd's massive cosmological encyclopedia, Michael Maier's alchemical emblems, John Dee's hieroglyphic monad, and Heinrich Khunrath's alchemical-Kabbalistic synthesis.
keyWorks: Fludd Utriusque Cosmi: Massive illustrated encyclopedia of macrocosm and microcosm
Dee Monas: Esoteric symbol unifying all knowledge
Khunrath Amphitheatrum: Alchemical-Kabbalistic masterpiece with famous laboratory engraving
Maier Atalanta Fugiens: Alchemical emblems with 50 musical fugues
researchValue: Core texts of the 'Rosicrucian Enlightenment' (Frances Yates). Represents the high point of Renaissance Hermetic philosophy before its decline in the face of mechanical philosophy.
